name: Update emails from a Google Sheet with email status using ZeroBounce
description: Every time a new row is added to a Google Sheet, Make will automatically validate the emails and update the Google Sheet with the status of the emails. This example uses the sheet in [this example](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1SxWIYYSZ_ZxtLjM0yNzHQG3u1kG55YMgDmrqjd23Cug/edit#gid=0).
